steps.title: Draw an oval and a line.
steps.content: Draw an oval and a line. Make sure the oval is drawn more like an egg shape.

steps.title: Add an oval and four lines.
steps.content: Add an oval and four lines.

steps.title: Draw a circle, a line, and a few more lines to mark the eyes.
steps.content: Draw a circle, a line, and a few more lines to mark the eyes. His glasses are a round shape and also are lopsided.

steps.title: Add the eyebrows, the nose, and a circle for the second eye.
steps.content: Add the eyebrows, the nose, and a circle for the second eye.

steps.title: Draw the mouth, hair, and a few more lines, as shown.
steps.content: Draw the mouth, hair, and a few more lines, as shown.

steps.title: Add the rest of the needed details.
steps.content: Add the rest of the needed details.

steps.title: Color the drawing.
steps.content: Color the drawing. You can use colored pencils to make shades.
